short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure your digital world with CyberArmor - the ultimate encryption and security tweaks extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing CyberArmor, a powerful Chrome extension that secures your files and enhances your browsing privacy. With just one click, you can encrypt or decrypt any file directly in your browser!

CyberArmor utilizes the AES-CBC algorithm to ensure robust file security. In addition, it offers six advanced techniques to safeguard your privacy while browsing:

i. Block common ads
ii. Prevent canvas fingerprinting
iii. Protect against font fingerprinting
iv. Guard against webgl fingerprinting
v. Prevent webrtc IP leakage
vi. Block common trackers

This user-friendly extension features a simple UI, eliminating the need for additional plugins. Just follow three easy steps: (1) load your file, (2) set a password, and (3) click the encrypt/decrypt button. To encrypt a file, browse and select your file, enter a password (twice), and click "Encrypt." The add-on automatically initiates the encryption process and downloads the encrypted file to your device. Follow the same procedure for decryption.

Enhance your file security and browsing privacy effortlessly with CyberArmor. Install now for a seamless and protected online experience!
